reviewText: a little long.. a little odd.. but good Christmas fun for kids of all ages. my children loved it on Netflix, and so we hunted it out on here.

There are 8 videos on this DVD (with the last 3 being live-action as indicated by *)

1. Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer (the cartoon version)
2. Christmas Comes But Once A Year
3. Snow Foolin' (Sing-A-Long cartoon)
4. Somewhere in Dreamland
5. To Spring
6. Brightest Night*
7. Santa Claus, Punch and Judy*
8. Silent Night: Story of the Christmas Carol*

It should also be noted that cartoons 2 and 4 have been restored on the Max Fleischer Color Classic: The Definitive Collection DVD if you don't mind paying more for it.
